title: Randomly dc'd from a game
body:
Hi,

I randomly got dc'd from a game, i checked my internet, if lol got stuck or shut down. that was'nt the case.
Now i can start a game again, like the game i was in never happend, also during the game i got a little lag and delay on my spells, auto-attacks, turrets everything like a little stutter and then i got disconnected from my game, while normally i don't have stutters and lag. The unusual thing was that players from the enemy team had it to. So i want to know why it happend? And if it happend to other players. Cause this is not normal to me.

Thanks!

Greetings instaguard

replies.body:
Ahhh sounds like you happened across a game that crashed on the server. It doesn't happen too often, but when it does everyone gets kicked and can't rejoin because the game no longer exists. You won't get any punishments and are free to queue back up. No harm no foul.

That little lag that *everyone* was experiencing is a little troublesome, has this kept happening?
